body: This is an Arduino based controller for a portable thermoelectric cooler to regulate the internal temperature.  It also provides a defrost mode to free the cooling fins inside the cooler from frost that accumulates as the cooler runs.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Thermoelectriccoolercontroller
tagline: Arduino based controller for Peltier based thermoelectric travel coolers
